---
title: "endianness-v2"
description: "Here's a file that was recovered from a 32-bits system that organized the bytes a weird way. We're not even sure what type of file it is."
pubDate: 2024-03-27
category: "forensics"
author: "sealldev"
section: "PicoCTF"
tags: ["medium"]
---

Downloading the file and initially using `file` on it does nothing.
```
$ file challengefile
challengefile: data
```

Let's try using some CyberChef to solve this. The challenge name is a big hint, referring to the idea of endianness its probably in the incorrect endian. Let's use CyberChef to select the input as the file, convert it to Hex and remove the whitespace. I then drag in 'swap endianness'

```
ff d8 ff e0 00 10 4a 46 49 46 00 01 01 00 00 01 00 01 00 00 ff db 00 43 00 08 06 06 07 06 05 08 07 07 07 09 09 08 0a 0c 14 0d 0c 0b 0b 0c 19 12 13 0f 14 1d 1a 1f 1e 1d 1a 1c 1c 20 24 2e 27 20 22 2c 23 1c 1c 28 37 29 2c 30 31 34 34 34 1f 27 39 3d 38 32 3c 2e 33 34 32 ff db 00 43 01 09 09 09 0c 0b 0c 18 0d 0d 18 32 21 1c 21 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 ff c0 00 11 08 00 96 01 2c 03 01 22 00 02 11 01 03 11 01 ff c4 00 1f 00 00 01 05 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 09 0a 0b ff c4 00 b5 10 00 02 01 03 03 02 04 03 05 05 04 04 00 00 01 7d 01 02 03 00 04 11 05...
```

Alright, I apply another 'Remove whitespace' to get rid of the spaces, and then magic spots something amazing!

It uses 'From Hex' and then 'Render Image' to see the flag!

The full CyberChef recipe is [here](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=To_Hex('Space',0)Remove_whitespace(true,true,true,true,true,false)Swap_endianness('Hex',4,true)Remove_whitespace(true,true,true,true,true,false)From_Hex('None')Render_Image('Raw')&%%%2B3P/Nl/SvvOK%2B2M32xznHHOotIAim2JT7FLYtj%2Bli25S%2Bq1WuBSVpgq2/vtQpJCzI/PeIAUfC8VB7p8umJ6aFyaaZuuogaH2/b3K4/cufcjmIyf8jlAcaZniRUtHVM8vSaky/Dp7T3bXO2X2d8EMMQy91tKUmQE/Ww%2BkuNgEv5ntYbsEx1PY/vvLH8w%2B9iU9s272xkfxTnOOFlRaQD0iK964toajd5C3Wu6sQUz89W8aJgfYAy0c3IuUEXqgWx6xp9E21B3UJtHwjI2wo5As6Oiz1bvsx3AsStQBxDLoqMDaIXx5bm3t%2BmjH6hjiWLF3rI5lmhhFlOSJGCYocLNDzkfqXiOtNgUH3XaPNroYI%2BshqskxdF5sTxrkFyE0k8MOYCAyp9hbqgoN7OyY%2B4WYuqa7MhQKIECqswAYkmSCiR3AJ7xuMOvc22byBXJ29yARJPvL/JPN7JElAYkz5cWjHNQDqC5HrjLiopvmQ7xX2naq%2BtLjmoIIoyZkfFS5FyXyRN5qA3kcz1Sx37xJFWikRab7LMs6m3dGtaPCwiiw1KoOFxvADgDZ5ycb4CMJNagVNHWm7t0s1KDsgZL6Zac1TmCqGw4bQ%2BC4DneJRWhYmBjo/aWlxcQ2WbG7U1Vmp88uehoFkBhFR87rNml92k%2BWFuWXHHXzuZI7VxFGk6BZRSOO%2BG0zU%2BfWcWBUGwaxEPd0MhuwDJ3VNraEp5BZXl2znNRDbIdsFnRaQCmzRr2VixzqRxH02xcZ0pRG8xneXPOQZXodGu3HVDry2HWFX67s6TToZXPj0TR4YZyoTpyorvdAG%2B3zbcDZHodn8aKXnosWsVvof5Vx95bqFLXamMjyZylZEth%2BcaBewB4EQ1wfbUfjubO8pYr7ODCN0TTHVVAOKuZn8qVsjtjlCAjx8sPVTQbxSS97bJUozwR5O3yaAD/TODkRExJ8BwrqfdgIDWt7%2BxlcXEbBMwFdUCCJJAy6kjqFAugOIw3NVdY845g7gkbhltI0qMfniCpSOz%2B3SB1V0lVn3EAyazaYXsheOL6wppFbxC4Nd0CRXajsW2mW9zZ/DJ2t4NAc4AzOFWUG2M6bfUt1CJ0%2B5k2ZJiUSUDB75xxvh56%2BTztsYZFXaJzNbM0ZXJrN5RWeMnRVok8EIInBybQA4FZQPHgHM0VJR10K%2BNLguLVu7S4a8aw1AWi%2B8kHTzskIbGMgwup1Q6r%2Bo7WTX9ozaihNFty1mD3dnaz8EZKAWuDeZiYssJzOhIcUdQaQFEUAEVRFABFiRUARbomGONvvz7wNMsTb0fCbbqdWWocAABsjKs9SXLhAIpu6gYvNTzt1Ho8WVnyWjLkixZEMLtch1C3rtv8qqgAHEf0cTU5GPVtPeiwX3W8HXVrSNymlicYGftJZl/MbxcwBXM3zAoBFH1dw3P4yLSG19raDl3LPk3W5myfRAmpPG92lyfybcXcabcG3O2Gjc2R6Xq3w3O%2BJPyf9i%2BQTHyajKayjdg7tmS0D%2BX7Cwd48GTkipqe6UV85ACyvEfh5NO1tDJLw7pPtyxNthzHMxm4xdKjGZ4Yx7EHOAzfe7229xfr2paM%2BsQQN2StRf72Vgfw7FFphgnAFBxDHsO4TYCitmsbvOk4azXTOVG2ZCh06OF1%2BeYbiJPgBBm9v5Ccc/DkTtDoZtC1V1suN4oI1H371P7HxXnCfJt4/Is/yCcToF5vpKOdkT05gKL
